医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究表明牙齿可能能够将抗体保存数百年一项新研究发现，牙齿可以将抗体保存数百年，使科学家能够研究人类传染病的历史。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230816/Teeth-may-be-able-to-preserve-antibodies-for-hundreds-of-years-study-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230816/Teeth-may-be-able-to-preserve-antibodies-for-hundreds-of-years-study-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d848036f-32ce-4cbc-b286-3e38928c094a Wed, 16 Aug 2023 21:51:20 -0400 Teeth may be able to preserve antibodies for hundreds of years, study reveals
一些早期、低风险乳腺癌患者术后可能不需要放疗根据麦克马斯特大学、不列颠哥伦比亚省癌症中心、汉密尔顿健康科学公司和不列颠哥伦比亚大学领导的最新研究，一些患有早期低风险乳腺癌的女性在保乳手术后可能不需要放疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230816/Some-early-stage-low-risk-breast-cancer-患者-may-not-need-radiotherapy-after-surgery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230816/Some-early-stage-low-risk-breast-cancer-患者-may-not-need-radiotherapy-after-surgery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d90d8640-27a1-4640-a197-3823fad41c5f Wed, 16 Aug 2023 21:45:06 -0400 Some early-stage, low-risk breast cancer patients may not need radiotherapy after surgery
注射特定的血液因子可以在大脑中复制运动的好处昆士兰大学研究人员进行的临床前试验发现，注射特定的血液因子可以复制大脑锻炼的益处。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230816/Injection-of-a-specific-blood-factor-can-replicate-the-benefits-of-exercise-in-the-brain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230816/Injection-of-a-specific-blood-factor-can-replicate-the-benefits-of-exercise-in-the-brain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=beb50e4d-3f2e-4ee9-923d-87a29e5408d2 Wed, 16 Aug 2023 21:40:14 -0400 Injection of a specific blood factor can replicate the benefits of exercise in the brain
心脏病发作后的中度或极度疼痛可能有助于预测全因死亡的风险心脏病发作的人通常会在大约一年后报告疼痛。根据今天发表在《美国心脏协会杂志》上的一项开放获取、美国心脏协会的同行评审期刊。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230816/Moderate-or-extreme-pain-after-a-heart-attack-may-help-predict-the-risk-for-alle28090cause-mortality.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230816/Moderate-or-extreme-pain-after-a-heart-attack-may-help-predict-the-risk-for-alle28090cause-mortality.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f4b8615b-6abe-4eb3-9ba9-2785602c7c56 Wed, 16 Aug 2023 21:36:22 -0400 Moderate or extreme pain after a heart attack may help predict the risk for all‐cause mortality
MD 安德森癌症中心授予四项 CPRIT 赠款，用于癌症预防计划和招募德克萨斯大学 MD 安德森癌症中心从德克萨斯州癌症预防和研究所 (CPRIT) 获得了四笔总计近 490 万美元的赠款，用于支持扩大针对幸存者的身体活动计划、传播有针对性的戒烟计划以及招募首次担任终身教授。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230816/MD-Anderson-awarded-four-CPRIT-grants-for-cancer-prevention-programs-and-recruitment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230816/MD-Anderson-awarded-four-CPRIT-grants-for-cancer-prevention-programs-and-recruitment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e9a53e2d-4f65-411d-a36d-d6c0559ffec1 Wed, 16 Aug 2023 21:24:23 -0400 MD Anderson awarded four CPRIT grants for cancer prevention programs and recruitment
复杂糖分子上的硫酸基影响大脑可塑性你能认出一个多年未见的人，但却忘记了昨天早餐吃的是什么吗？我们的大脑不断地重新排列其电路来记住熟悉的面孔或学习新技能，但这一过程的分子基础尚不清楚。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230816/Sulfate-groups-on-complex-sugar-molecules-affect-brain- Plasticity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230816/Sulfate-groups-on-complex-sugar-molecules-affect-brain- Plasticity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=82e76d54-cbd4-45ba-8fe3-70493dfef761 Wed, 16 Aug 2023 14:43:43 -0400 Sulfate groups on complex sugar molecules affect brain plasticity
生物工程纳米囊泡可以改善癌症治疗纽约州立大学宾厄姆顿大学的研究表明，纳米囊泡可以通过生物工程来靶向癌细胞并直接提供治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230816/Bioengineered-nanovesicles-could-improve-cancer-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230816/Bioengineered-nanovesicles-could-improve-cancer-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8323e7b2-6cdd-4c01-a420-ec78faee1584 Wed, 16 Aug 2023 14:41:25 -0400 Bioengineered nanovesicles could improve cancer treatment
研究发现，大多数因 RSV 入住 ICU 的婴儿以前都很健康根据 JAMA Network Open 上报道的一项新研究，2022 年秋季因呼吸道合胞病毒 (RSV) 感染而入住重症监护室或重症监护病房的大多数婴儿以前都很健康且足月出生。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230816/Most-infants-admiss-to-ICU-for-RSV-were-previously-healthy-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230816/Most-infants-admiss-to-ICU-for-RSV-were-previously-healthy-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7ca2deb8-9a5b-40bd-80e1-b7250eb347b9 Wed, 16 Aug 2023 14:31:26 -0400 Most infants admitted to ICU for RSV were previously healthy, study finds
多模式干预方法在管理和逆转认知障碍方面显示出希望阿尔茨海默病和相关痴呆症 (ADRD) 护理领域的领先专家希瑟·桑迪森 (Heather Sandison) 博士最近在《阿尔茨海默病杂志》上发表了一项开创性的研究，强调认知能力下降的个体的认知功能显着改善。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230816/Multimodal-intervention-approach-shows-promise-in-managing-and-reversing-cognitive-impairment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230816/Multimodal-intervention-approach-shows-promise-in-managing-and-reversing-cognitive-impairment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=244c646b-a149-49b7-8a2e-e2fbdf2cb7a7 Wed, 16 Aug 2023 14:05:29 -0400 Multimodal intervention approach shows promise in managing and reversing cognitive impairment
研究表明动脉硬化是青少年过早心脏损伤的新原因一项新的后续研究表明，动脉硬化是青少年过早心脏损伤的一个新原因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230816/Study-shows-arterial-stiffness-as-a-novel-cause-of-premature-heart-damage-among-adolescents.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230816/Study-shows-arterial-stiffness-as-a-novel-cause-of-premature-heart-damage-among-adolescents.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e4e79657-58d3-478a-8300-9df59fd68b19 Wed, 16 Aug 2023 13:46:58 -0400 Study shows arterial stiffness as a novel cause of premature heart damage among adolescents
